## Run scripts
node bin/naivecoin.js -p 3001 --name 1
node main.js --port 3001

## Function 1

// Create a new wallet from password
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' -d '{"password": "t t t t t"}' 'http://localhost:3001/operator/wallets'
 - by password

// Generation of public key and private key
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'password: t t t t t' 'http://localhost:3001/operator/wallets/991809110c62247fda8ebd272ec3c92fc4fb31905c43ad6cf9d9a6077194d263/addresses'
 - by password, walletId

// Get wallet by ID
curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'http://localhost:3001/operator/wallets/991809110c62247fda8ebd272ec3c92fc4fb31905c43ad6cf9d9a6077194d263'
 - by walletId

## Function 2

// genereate attendance certificate
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' -d '{"studentId": "20063049d","eventId": "COMP4001"}' 'http://localhost:3001/operator/generateAttendanceCert'

// sign attendance certificate
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' -d '{
  "attendanceCert": {
    "timestamp": "Sun Nov 24 2024 01:04:12 GMT+0800 (Hong Kong Standard Time)",
    "studentId": "20063043d",
    "course": "COMP4001"
  },
  "addressId": "c3c96504e432e35caa94c30034e70994663988ab80f94e4b526829c99958afa8",
  "secretKey": ""
}' 'http://localhost:3001/operator/signAttendanceCert'


## Function 3
// get all unconfirmed transaction
curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'http://localhost:3001/blockchain/transactions'

// add attendance transaction + check signature
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' -d '{"timestamp":"Sun Nov 24 2024 01:04:12 GMT+0800 (Hong Kong Standard Time)","studentId":"20063043d","course":"COMP4001","signature":"46c152e5819b62eab98729b6c67fe9914ebb288990255f74050e5819430381fa1f5c9027203871b96808e746b1ddf577f13c21928cb89b2589d1b1988b731604","address":"c3c96504e432e35caa94c30034e70994663988ab80f94e4b526829c99958afa8"}' 'http://localhost:3001/blockchain/attendance'

// mine a block
curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{ "rewardAddress":"c3c96504e432e35caa94c30034e70994663988ab80f94e4b526829c99958afa8" }' 'http://localhost:3001/miner/mine'
